channel.title: "REVOLT RADIO"
channel.description:
"REVOLT RADIO" is a unique mix of Underground, Commercial, Mash-Up Hip-Hop with a sprinkling of Rock, Pop and alternative flavors. Each broadcast looks to rebel against what you’re currently hearing on the airwaves right now. Hosted by Black Knight with mixes from DJ Nominal, DJ Ykcor, DJ Leche and DJ Tenacious, Revolt Radio airs every Wednesday and Saturday with album, mixtape and single releases throughout the week as well. On FEBRUARY 23rd the show will open its new site and present a 24/7 streaming format to its listeners, Artist Spotlights, DJ Spotlights, Blogs, Mixing/Mastering Services, Promotional Packages, Production and much more. STAY TUNED AS REVOLT RADIO CONTINUES TO EVOLVE AND CREATE MORE OPPORTUNITIES FOR PROFESSIONAL ARTISTS. THE FIRST BROADCAST DEBUTED MARCH 26TH, 2008. TUNE IN EVERY WEDNESDAY FROM 8:00-9:00PM ON PODOMATIC.COM!!!
TUNE IN WEEKLY ON MIXLAWAX!!!
TUNE IN EVERY SATURDAY FROM 6:00-7:00PM ON UNHEARD RADIO!!!
MUSIC SUBMISSIONS: revoltradiomp3@gmail.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: REVOLUTIONIZING RADIO 1 SONG AT A TIME

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Revolt Radio (Wordsmith, Black Knight & DJ Nominal)

item.title: (REVOLT RADIO PREMIER/NEW SITE LAUNCHES FEB. 23RD ) The-Dream – Love King
item.description:
Judging on how The-Dream got snubbed at the Grammys, Radio Killa is ready to beast because he’s got something to prove now. This one comes unexpectedly but it is the title track and official first single from the Love King album coming soon. Its definitely got that dream sound, so expect the radio airwaves to be blasting this one soon

THE NEW!!! REVOLT RADIO WEBSITE WILL BE LAUNCHING FEB 23RD!!!

FEATURING REVOLT RADIO 24/7 STREAMING AND THE REVOLUTIONARY RIOT REPORT BLOG

PROMOTIONAL PACKAGES, PLUS MUCH MORE!!

item.title: (REVOLT RADIO PREMIER/NEW SITE LAUNCHES FEB. 23RD) Snoop Dogg–I Wanna Rock Feat. Rick Ross, Yo Gotti, Maino, OJ Da Juiceman & Roscoe Dash (Interstate Trafficking Remix)
item.description:
Continuing with remixes of Snoop Dogg's hit record " I wanna Rock" Off of "Malice N Wonderland", The Evil Genius DJ Green Lantern takes it down south with the Interstate Trafficking Remix. Snoop delivers yet another G'd Up verse along with strong back up by Rick Ross, Yo Gotti, and Maino. Sorry I dont even know why people call OJ Da Juiceman A rapper, and why there are actually people who like him but he is also on the remix, with also Roscoe Dash. Besides the juice, this is in my opinion the best version I have heard of yet, besides the original of course.

ONLINE FEBRUARY 23rd, 2010

THE NEW!!! REVOLT RADIO WEBSITE WILL BE LAUNCHING FEB 23RD!!!

FEATURING REVOLT RADIO 24/7 STREAMING AND THE REVOLUTIONARY RIOT REPORT BLOG

PROMOTIONAL PACKAGES, PLUS MUCH MORE!!

item.title: (REVOLT RADIO MIXTAPE EXCLUSIVE/NEW SITE LAUNCHES FEB. 23RD) Ludacris Feat. Lil Kim & Lil Fate – Hey Ho
item.description:
Ludacris has been dropping gems up his upcoming album "Battle Of The Sexes" for a few weeks now and I happen to like each and everyone, along with this new leak tittle "Hey Ho" Featuring Lil Kim & Lil Fate. Make sure you go out ang get the album next. month.

item.title: (REVOLT RADIO PREMIER/NEW SITE LAUNCHES FEB. 23RD) Wordsmith Feat. Kontact, Black Knight, Cyrano, Braille, Gripz, Laelo Hood, Lef, Steadfast, E-Major, Sir Aah, Genesis Elijah, Manny Moscow & Junclassic- Coming For The Top Spot (Produced By Stealf)
item.description:
Already releasing "Leap of Faith" and "Slanguistics"a off of his February 23rd "Vintage Vault Mixtape" Word is unlocking two more exclusives, "The Making of Senor Wordsmith" (Produced by Strada) and "Coming for the Top Spot" (Produced by Stealf) Feat. Kontact, Black Knight, Cyrano, Braille, Gripz, Laelo Hood, Lef, Steadfast, E-Major, Sir Aah, Genesis Elijah, Manny Moscow & Junclassic A Precursor to Word's Debut Album, "VINTAGE EXPERIENCE," hitting online outlets March 30TH, 2010, these promo releases should keep all his fans occupied til they can experience Word's debut. Most of the material on the mixtape has been locked up in Word's crates since 2005, so enjoy unlocking some quality music that has marinated for the past few years.
The Mixtape is mixed/blended by NU Revolution DeeJays "DJ Ykcor" and "DJ Nominal," while the project is hosted by UK Mixtape master "DJ Ames." Production on the mixtape stays in house with Strada, Professa, Capish, and Street Level lending some heat, while UK super producer "Stealf" contributes a track as well. Features include NU Revolution Camp Super group "Kontact & Black Knight," Soulstice, Junclassic, Cyrano, Whitefolkz, RatheMC, Braille, Steadfast, Sir Aah, Laelo Hood and more, while UK underground stars Manny Mascow & Genesis Elijah lend some international vocals.
CLICK HERE TO Listen/Download Wordsmth- The Making Of Senor Wordsmith(Produced By Strada)

THE NEW!!! REVOLT RADIO WEBSITE WILL BE LAUNCHING FEB 23RD!!!

FEATURING REVOLT RADIO 24/7 STREAMING AND THE REVOLUTIONARY RIOT REPORT BLOG

PROMOTIONAL PACKAGES, PLUS MUCH MORE!!
